bibl.title: Literary Society To Hold Mock Trial
Untitled
Lake Andes Wave

div1.p: The Invincible Literary soceity society which holds its meetings at the Novotny school house, will hold another meeting on Friday evening, December 4th. The entertainment for the evening is a mock trial of a $50,000 breach of promise suit, with O. V. Graham as attorney for the plaintiff and Paul Picotte and Ray Newman as attorneys for the defendant. R. C. Baker will preside as judge and Prof. Crosswait as clerk of court. This society has already given two popular programs, both of which were well received by the audience. Everyone is invited to attend these meetings.
